text: is a party video game developed by Nd Cube and published by Nintendo for the Wii U. It is the tenth "main" game in the Mario Party series, the fourteenth in the franchise, and the first and only game in the series for the Wii U. The game was released worldwide in March 2015. == Development == After Mario Party 9, Nintendo wanted to create Mario Party 10. They made Bowser playable. They also advertised Mario Party 10. Mario Party 10 released on March 12, 2015 in Japan and March 20 in North America and Europe. == References == # "Nintendo Direct". YouTube. January 14, 2015. Archived from the original on January 14, 2015. Retrieved January 14, 2015.
